doc:
Brian Hildebrand https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brian_Hildebrand 0 Brian Curtis Hildebrand (January 21, 1962 – September 8, 1999) was an American professional wrestling manager, wrestler and referee who sometimes went by the name of Mark Curtis. Although trained in brawling, technical, and high-flying wrestling techniques, he spent most of his career as a manager and referee. Brian_Curtis_Hildebrand ( January_21_,_1962 – September_8_,_1999 ) was an_American_professional_wrestling_manager , wrestler and referee who sometimes went by the_name of Mark_Curtis . Although trained in brawling , technical , and high-flying_wrestling_techniques , he spent most of his_career as a_manager_and_referee .
